title: Need some help for finding this font, thanks!
content:
Hi there,  
I am doing some research for this font but still got no clue, I am appreciated if anyone can give me a hand, thanks!

Keith

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131923im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_1_5854.jpg)

Font: 

 Erasmus™ 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131923/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: keithluc

comments.content: I think it's a manually condensed **[Erasmus Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131923/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Red-Rooster%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=ErasmusMedium%20-%20Regular&fid=68f379e220e988ac266a5f34771d2ac2&fsize=48&text=TrtorEfWPUSSecRD%20QurdinapBy%20KAYNCoTONJEAIM&wrap=2)** by Red Rooster [1993]
